title: Edith Bowman: Meet the Author
itunes:author: Apple
itunes:subtitle: Edith Bowman
itunes:summary: Edith Bowman discusses her new book, Edith Bowman’s Great British Music Festivals, at the Apple Store, Regent Street in London. Edith reflects on some of the greatest festival moments of the last 20 years, and shares her insights from behind the scenes of the UK’s best music festivals.
